name: latke

a flat, round piece of fried food made with grated (= cut into very small pieces) potatoes : Potato pancakes or latkes are a staple of the festival of Hanukkah. Eat the latkas while they're still warm and crisp, with the apple sauce.
More examplesFewer examplesI had smoked brisket with potato latkes.Latkes are made of grated potatoes and onion with eggs and flour. On Jewish holidays, I make latkes from scratch.Latkes are traditionally eaten at the Jewish festival of Hanukkah.Her potato latkes were delicious plain, but even better topped with sour cream or apple sauce.
